description: This walk visits Bay Lough near Tullaghorton, County Tipperary. The Corrie lake is part of the Knockmealdown Mountain range, a stunning area popular with hikers. You can start the walk from the car parking area at The Vee just to the south of the lake. From here you can pick up a pleasant trail heading north for just over 1km to reach the lough. It's a beautiful and remote area with wonderful views over the water to the surrounding mountains. You can continue your walking in the area on The Vee Walk . You'll visit the stunning Vee Gap where you can enoy some more splendid views over the Galty Mountains.
